successes.title: JUICIES+ for iPhone, Android, BlackBerry and Windows Phones
successes.description: Anodized Aluminium, Tangle Free Woven Cable and MFi Certification. It's the perfect match. Simply the cable Apple should have made!

Pledges.description: Early Bird: One (1) JUICIES+ cable in either Black or Silver. Choose from Lightning or Micro USB. Shipping is included for US backers. All others please add $5.
Gold Rush: One (1) JUICIES+ cable in any of the colors you see in the project description! Choose from Lightning or Micro USB. Shipping is included for US backers. All others please add $5.
Awesome: One (1) JUICIES+ cable in either Black or Silver. Choose from Lightning or Micro USB. Shipping is included for US backers. All others please add $5.
Double Awesome: Two (2) JUICIES+ cables in either Black or Silver. Choose from Lightning or Micro USB. Shipping is included for US backers. All others please add $5.
Family Pack: Four (4) JUICIES+ cables in either Black or Silver. Choose from Lightning or Micro USB. Shipping is included for US backers. All others please add $5.
